CustomField.formula:
OR(
AND( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Type__c, 'Sale'), Quote_Line_with_Inactive_Product__c = 0, Unapproved_QL__c = 0, NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Type, 'Pending Approval')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, 'Closed Lost')), X0_dollar_lines__c = 0, Status_Approved_Presented__c = True, Quote_Expired__c = False, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Quote_Request__c)), ISPICKVAL(Quote_Request__r.Quote_Status__c, 'Complete'), True) ),
AND( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Type__c, 'Sale'), Quote_Line_with_Inactive_Product__c = 0, Unapproved_QL__c = 0, NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Type, 'Pending Approval')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, 'Closed Lost')), X0_dollar_lines__c = 0, ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, 'Accepted'), Quote_Expired__c = False, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Quote_Request__c)), ISPICKVAL(Quote_Request__r.Quote_Status__c, 'Complete'), True) ),
AND( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Type__c, 'Sale'), Quote_Line_with_Inactive_Product__c = 0, Unapproved_QL__c = 0, NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Type, 'Pending Approval')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, 'Closed Lost')), X0_dollar_lines__c = 0, ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, 'Accepted'), Quote_Expired__c = True, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Quote_Request__c)), ISPICKVAL(Quote_Request__r.Quote_Status__c, 'Complete'), True) )
)
CustomField.label: Send RBO Formula
